SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class manages flow of the game, including scene transitions, level loading, and audio management. It acts as the central hub for controlling the game's main menu, levels and settings.

    • Controller

      public Controller(javafx.stage.Stage stage, double screenWidth)
      Constructs new Controller instance. Initialises stage, audio manager, and other necessary components.
      Parameters:
      stage - : primary stage of the application.
      screenWidth - : width of screen.

  • Method Details

    • showMainMenu

      public void showMainMenu()
      Displays main menu of the game. Initialises main menu scene and sets it as current scene.

    • launchGame

      public void launchGame() throws Exception
      Launches the game by showing the stage and transitioning to first level.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading first level.

    • resetAndRelaunchGame

      public void resetAndRelaunchGame()
      Resets game and relaunches it by clearing the scene stack, showing main menu and launching the game.

    • goToLevel

      private void goToLevel(String className) throws Exception
      Loads and transitions to specified level.
      Parameters:
      className - : fully qualified class name of level to load.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while loading the level.
